text: "Waiting..." is the first single from City and Colour's second album, Bring Me Your Love. The song peaked at No. 32 on the Canadian Hot 100. ==References== ==External links== Category:2008 singles Category:City and Colour songs Category:2008 songs Category:Songs written by Dallas Green (musician) Category:Dine Alone Records singles
title: Waiting... (City and Colour song)
